body:
Comment 1: 
The method exists.

log.go:130: func (l *Logger) Output(calldepth int, s string) error {

Given that method, it's easy to write custom loggers by embedding a Logger in your own
implementation.

The function would need state that's part of the logger, so it wouldn't be much use on
its own.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
